summary: Simply changes the dark brotherhood to dragon scale armor and add new hoods to go with it
descriptionHtml:
This is a Updated version of my old mod Dark Brotherhood Dragonscale.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
So a wile go i made simple replace retexter mod for skyrim and the texture work was great but i had no idea hot set my file up it was mess then i loss the password to the account so i moved on and afew years later i Came back on a new account and have since released a few mods and completely fogto about the retexture untile a few nights ago i was scrolling throu dark brotherhood armor mods and found my old Retexture so here is new and much better version of the mod.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Changes
All dark brother hood light armor has been changed to dragonscale with new textures
* this is all versions this means if you are attacked by an assain he will be were ing the new armor and so will and of the npcs who were the light armor in the dark brotherhood including asdrids husband(robes and clothing are unchanged)*

New dragonscale hoods to mach the armor

the masked hood is gone for females.

NOW no matter what version you were the males is unique to the male and the female is unique to the female 

Skimmpy version:
female light armor for females is  skimpier (vanillabodys)
================================================================================================================================
Special thanks:

[b]Ketwaroo D Yaasir [/b]creator of [b]Somewhat Skimpy DragonScale Armour with CBBEv2 version[/b]:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5411/?

[b]gamergirl109 [/b]creator of [b]Dragonscale Hood[/b]:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3300/?
author: Tokinklownz
